item.title: UpdataBlog
item.description: 1.新建博客 1hugo new post/*.md 2.更新静态网页 1hugo --theme=hugo-clarity --baseUrl="https://Jerrysmd.github.io/" 3.推到GithubPages 1cd public/ 2git add . 3git commit -m 'why' 4git push -u origin master
